Letter B 𒁀 ⋍ 𓊪 p ≈ b 𓃀 𒁀 ⋍ 𒀸·𒀶 ≈ 𒀸𒋰𒁹 ≈ 𒀴

𒁀 BA 𜎯 ba bowl/pot 𔕷/𔕹 pa 𔖎/𔕯
𒁀 baʳ ⇔ 𓈞 Brunn 𓈟 白日 bái 𒌓 bright 𒁀𒊏𒄣 𒁀𒊑𒊒

𒁀 baʳ
𒁀 baʳ bi²part divide, distribute, gebe > give
𒁀 baʳ body-parts in 𒋝𒁀 lower body 𒁀 baʳ paʳ part 𒁀 ≈ 𓍏 𒁀 ≈ 𒀊 ap 𒁀 ≈ 𓄋 𓊪 𓏴 open… 𒁀 ≈ 𓂘 פָּתוּחַ patúakh 𓊪 𓎼 𓂘
𒁀 baʳ paʳ portion, apportion, ration 𒁀 baʳ paʳ ܚܦܪ ħpar 𒁀𒀠 paʳal փորել pʿorel 𒁄 𒀡 𒀦 𒄫𒂖 peʳel "dig" <> bury bergen 𒁀 baʳ paʳ in 𒍥𒁀𒁀 par.zid₂ ≈ porridge
𒁀 baʳ in •bargā > वर्ग varga persegi 𒁀𒁲;𒁀𒋛 ba-si₈;ba-si basi base bi² square (math.) pătrat quadrat 𒁀 baʳ bear bǎ 把 巴 𒁀 port "carry"
𒁀 baʳ break (𓎛𓋴)𓃀𓏴𓌪𓂡 kes-part @Ural
𒁀 baʳ > baˡ in 𒁍 púʳ पुराण purāṇa ⇔ 𐀞𐀨𐀍 pa-ra-jo 𒁀𒁀𒀀 paleo "old man" babaya
𒁀 baˢ be4 base "to deduct, remove
to diminish, reduce" ≈ 𒉿 pi be6
𒁀 ba pass 𓊪 𓊃 𓈙 𓏴 (divide) ⇔ piece, post, paste, putk- (Tocharian B)
𒁀 ba pass (divide) बांटना bā̃ṭnā բաժանել baža(nel) פיצל pitzél قَسَّمَ qas
𒁀 ba pass (divide) ⇔ p-s-s pasaq भजति bhajati ⇔ فَسَقَ fasaqa ⇔ פֶסַח pesach passover
𒁀 ba pay = bar 𒁇

𒁀 ba •back in 𒀀𒁀 ≈ 𒀀𒂵 bu.ga back "rear" 𒆠𒆪 ki'bid₃ •butt "backside, ass" #kibid body-parts
